pkgmetadata.longdescription: Diewert and Fox's Method of Value Added Growth Decomposition // Decomposing value added growth into explanatory factors. A cost constrained value added function is defined to specify the production frontier. Industry estimates can also be aggregated using a weighted average approach. Details about the methodology and data can be found in Diewert and Fox (2018) doi:10.1093/oxfordhb/9780190226718.013.19 and Zeng, Parsons, Diewert and Fox (2018) https://www.business.unsw.edu.au /research-site/centreforappliedeconomicresearch- site/Documents/emg2018-6_SZeng_EMG-Slides.pdf.
